titleStmt.title: A treatise concerning the trinitie of persons in vnitie of the deitie Written to Thomas Mannering an Anabaptist, who denyed that Iesus is very God of very God: but man onely, yet endued with the infinite power of God.
titleStmt.author: Gill, Alexander, 1565-1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Simon Stafford, dwelling on Adling hill neere Carter-lane,

notesStmt.note: The Bodleian copy has date in imprint changed by pen to read 1603.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
